p: In Fig 3C, we fixed other parameters (Aggreg = 3, Abund = intermediate level, female body length = 115 cm and type of memorization = Mem1) and considered only females that successfully breed their pup. The E fish by trip increased with the distance to the resource. However, the sum over the breeding period of the weight gain by the pups decreased with Dist (ranging from 31.2 ± 7.2 kg to 19.1 ± 2.3 kg).
